com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.connectivity

Class DefaultDestinationFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.connectivity.AbstractDestinationFacade
      • com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.connectivity.DefaultDestinationFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DestinationFacade

    public class DefaultDestinationFacade
extends AbstractDestinationFacade
    Default implementation of AbstractDestinationFacade that uses the environment variable "destinations" to define destinations.

      • getGenericDestinationsByName

        public Map<String,GenericDestination> getGenericDestinationsByName()
                                                            throws DestinationAccessException
        Returns all destinations by their names.
        Returns:
        A map containing all destinations indexed by their name.
        Throws:
        DestinationAccessException - If there is an issue while accessing destination information.
